body_html: @lspvic Thanks for fixing the additional bug. I would prefer to keep the existing default for now, since changing it might break existing code. We don't have to match Numpy in all cases, but I agree that it might make sense here. Would you be willing to make that single change in a separate PR?

body: @lspvic Thanks for fixing the additional bug. I would prefer to keep the existing default for now, since changing it might break existing code. We don't have to match Numpy in all cases, but I agree that it might make sense here. Would you be willing to make that single change in a separate PR?
